description: Detects extraction of files with usage of steghide binary, the adversaries may use this technique to prevent the detection of hidden information. Author: Pawel Mazur. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Steganography Extract Files with Steghide
query: (type:"EXECVE" AND a0:"steghide" AND a1:"extract" AND a2:"\-sf" AND a3:(*.jpg OR *.png))
